Original:
以前總是路過而已，今天第一次進店用餐。

晚上8點左右，只有我這組客人，店員服務態度不錯，餐點也不賴。

直到約20:30開始就陸續有別的客人進店，他們似乎都是熟客，和店員關係不錯，且店員還坐在他們那桌一起聊天。但是這些客人有權利可以點自己要聽歌，不需過問；聲量也沒在控制，後來還可以店內抽菸，店員卻說這是因為21:00後開始解禁。以上的確讓我感到不受尊重與無形的壓力。

不太明白室內抽菸是否可以脫離法律限制的三人以上公共場所不准抽菸的規範。另外沒開發票加上沒有太好的用餐環境，還要加上服務費一成有點讓我傻眼。

憑良心，我還是給兩顆星，原因是店員始終有求必應，且面帶笑容，以及店內陳設有用心。

在此想呼籲，不管是客人還是店員都還是要給與他人多些尊重，抽菸在店外抽又有何不可呢？抽完在進店嘛！Just a matter of moral！希望以後會有改進，不然想要擁有良好用餐品質的客人只能選擇包場囉！
EN:
I used to pass by before, I entered the store for the first time today.

At around 8 pm, only my group of guests, the clerk's service attitude was good, and the meal was not bad.

Until 20:30, there were other guests entering the store one after another. They seemed to be cooked customers. They had a good relationship with the clerk, and the clerk was sitting at their table to chat together.However, these guests have the right to order to listen to songs, and do not need to ask; the volume is not controlled, and later they can smoke in the store, but the clerk said that it was lifted by lifting the ban after 21:00.The above does make me feel unwilling and invisible.

I don't quite understand whether the indoor smoking can be separated from the legal restrictions of public places that are not allowed to smoke.In addition, there is no invoicing and no good dining environment, and the service fee is a bit dumbfounded.

Based on my conscience, I still give two stars because the clerk has always responded, and with a smile, and the intention of the shop in the store.

I want to call for it, whether it is guests or clerks, they still have to give more respect for others. What is impossible for smoking to smoke outside the store?After entering the store!Just a Matter of Moral!I hope there will be improvements in the future, otherwise guests who want to have a good meal quality can only choose the charter!

Original: 完美的酒吧，適合舉辦聚會。他們以提供吉尼斯黑啤酒和克羅南堡啤酒而聞名。他們也提供手抓食物。強烈推薦。

Original:
幾個月前，我在拜訪朋友的辦公室時偶然發現了The Pub。從那時起，我就常去這個地方。我真正喜歡的一件事是啤酒的新鮮度。

我是黑啤酒愛好者。酒吧提供了新鮮的吉尼斯黑啤酒。每次來這裡，我總是能喝到很好喝的酒。生啤酒的新鮮度始終保持得很好。此外，還提供比爾森啤酒和各種其他類型的飲料。服務也很好，他們對所有客人都很友好。酒吧給我留下了很好的印象。

酒吧裡的氣氛也非常愉快。我週末總是和朋友一起去，這裡的氣氛總是很好。音樂總是伴隨著客人，讓他們能夠愉快地交談。歐式風格的內裝非常好。這個地方的氣氛讓我想起了我在那裡的時候。

我在這個地方吃過幾次飯了，食物也非常美味。你需要嘗試在這個地方吃晚餐。我吃過披薩、炒飯和炸雞。所有的食物都很美味。這裡的食物和飲料會讓你想念這個地方（就像我一樣）。參觀這個地方並享用飲品對我來說始終是一次愉快的經歷。
EN:
A few months ago, I accidentally discovered The Pub when I visited my friend's office.Since then, I have often gone to this place.One thing I really like is the freshness of beer.

I am a black beer enthusiast.The bar offers fresh Guinness black beer.Every time I come here, I can always drink delicious wine.The freshness of raw beer has always maintained well.In addition, Bilson beer and various other types of drinks are also available.The service is also very good, they are very friendly to all guests.The bar left me a good impression.

The atmosphere in the bar is also very happy.I always go with my friends on weekends, and the atmosphere here is always good.Music is always accompanied by guests, allowing them to talk happily.The European style interior is very good.The atmosphere of this place reminds me of when I was there.

I have eaten several times in this place, and the food is very delicious.You need to try dinner in this place.I have eaten pizza, fried rice and fried chicken.All foods are delicious.The food and drinks here will make you miss this place (just like me).It is always a pleasant experience for me to visit this place and enjoying drinks.
